page.title: 20Festival,Ayot St.Lawrence
page.content: {AYOT ST.LAWRENCE}began having a { {SUMMER FESTIVAL }11yrs. ago as the C.ofE. wanted to close the church as too few people lived in the parish so the villagers decided to pay for its upkeep to keep it open.The profits also pay the council back for the money lent to buy the village field. The festival is not the same every year.The art section is the most successful because the festival gets 20% of the profits.This year they have had a medieval village supper.They had a slave dancer,a fire-eater,and a woman who dances with snakes.There was even a woman there with a live monkey on her hat!They don't display any other arts and crafts apart from paintings.They tried it once but it wasn't a success.The festival raises over 3500 pounds for the church and field each year.
